title._content: Image taken from page 377 of 'Das neue Buch der Reisen und Entdeckungen. O Spamer's illustrirte Bibliothek der Länder & Völkerkunde, etc. (Unter redaktion von F. von Hellwald und R. Oberländer.) vol. 1'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Das neue Buch der Reisen und Entdeckungen. O Spamer's illustrirte Bibliothek der Länder & Völkerkunde, etc. (Unter redaktion von F. von Hellwald und R. Oberländer.) vol. 1" Author: SPAMER, Johann Gottlieb Christian Otto. Contributor: HELLWALD, Friedrich Anton Heller von - Baron Contributor: OBERLAENDER, Richard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10026.g.23." Volume: 02 Page: 377 Place of Publishing: Leipzig Date of Publishing: 1870 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003455744 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
